DOC.brief_summary: Peptide YY (PYY) is a gastrointestinal hormone released from the enteroendocrine cell upon food intake. The N-terminal truncated form, PYY3-36, exerts anorexic effects. In this study we want to investigate the kinetics of PYY1-36 and PYY3-36 and to examine whether a C-terminally degraded metabolite, PYY3-34, is formed after infusion of PYY.
DOC.brief_title: Degradation of the Anorexic Hormone Peptide YY
DOC.criteria: Healthy Normal BMI (18.525kg/m2) Diabetes Mellitus Gastric bypass Noncaucasian Height changes >3 kg within last two months Hemoglobin < 7.6 mmol/l Chronic disease Smoking Regularly use of medicine Drug abuse
